Yeah, Roll20 is optimized for sure.

because he's such a bad trainer.

It's quiet.
Thank you.
Too quiet. - Perfect.
- That is, until you see two glowing red eyes
breaking through the dark.
At first, you may think it might be two leaves
or two red marbles or a red-eyed bear.
But as your eyes adjust to the darkness,
you realize it's something much, much more terrifying.
Me.
part dog, part ant, part monkey, part lava, part food,
part bird, and part fire ant.
My name strikes fear across almost all cultures,
and they all have some name for me.
